overlay.description: If true, the billboard is rendered on top of other objects. (Default: false)

rotationAxis.description: The axes around which the billboard rotates. 'X', 'Y', and/or 'Z'. (Default: ['X', 'Y', 'Z'])

scaleWithDistance.description: If true, the billboard scales with distance from the camera. (Default: false)

up.description: The up direction of the billboard. Must be defined if `viewDirection` is parallel to the default up vector. (Default: +Y)

viewDirection.description: The view direction of the billboard. (Default: +Z)
